attributes.action: Increase the Student Loan repayment threshold in line with inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount you have to earn before you start paying back a Student Loan has been static at £15,000 a year, for a long time (at least 5 years).  This is quite unfair because £15,000 is not a 'graduate salary' any more.  The threshold should increase in line with inflation each year.
